Class SquareTable

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.rm.reagroup.playfield.SquareTable
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IShape

    public class SquareTable
extends java.lang.Object
implements IShape
    This class implements a square shaped table with an integer length.

    hawk
